headline: HII Hosts Marine Corps Commandant Gen. Eric Smith at Ingalls Shipbuilding
summary: PASCAGOULA, Miss., Sept. 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- HII (NYSE: HII) hosted Gen. Eric Smith, the 39th commandant of the U.S. Marine Corps, at the company’s Ingalls Shipbuilding division Wednesday. During his visit, Smith met with Ingalls leadership and toured the shipyard, including America-class amphibious assault ship Bougainville (LHA 8). “The skills and dedication of our Ingalls shipbuilders were on full display during this visit and I am proud of the critical role our team plays in support

content.title: HII Hosts Marine Corps Commandant Gen. Eric Smith at Ingalls Shipbuilding
